meanings.definition: An area of grassy land, especially one used for recreation or as a park.
meanings.sent1: Children played happily on the greenswards in the park.
meanings.sent2: The picnic was set up on the lush greenswards of the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The ducks waddled across the greenswards, looking for hidden treats.
meanings.sent4: The greenswards stretched out like a soft, green blanket under the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh grass filled the air as we walked on the greenswards.

meanings.definition: The grassy surface of a lawn or meadow.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully mowed the greenswards to keep them neat.
meanings.sent2: The dew glistened on the greenswards in the early morning light.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy rolled around on the greenswards, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The greenswards whispered softly in the breeze, a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The greenswards felt cool and refreshing under our bare feet.
